hints.content:
We start at $4{:}22$ when Andrey starts working on his science project.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 4:15 to 5:15 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 4:22. !

hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents $1$ minute.

So, we need to move **right** on the number line $48$ minutes.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{4{:}22} +{} &\greenD{3}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}25\\\\
4{:}25 +{} & \purpleD{35}\text{ minutes} = 5{:}00 \\\\
5{:}00 +{}&\goldE{10}\text{ minutes} = \goldE{5{:}10}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 4:15 to 5:15 with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving left to right from the 4:22 tick mark to the 5:10 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 4:22  tick mark and ends at the 4:25 tick mark and is labeled plus 3. The second arrow starts at the 4:25 tick mark and ends at the 5:00 tick mark and is labeled plus 35. The third arrow starts at the 5:00 tick mark and ends at the 5:10 tick mark and is labeled plus 10. !

hints.content:
Andrey finishes working on his science project at $5{:}10 \text{ p.m.}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 4:15 to 5:15 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:10. !

question.content:
Andrey starts working on his science project at $4{:}22\text{ p.m.}$ He finishes $48$ minutes later. 

**Which number line below graphs when Andrey finishes working on his science project?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 4:15 to 5:15 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 4:48.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/488b7b6aa856dbf5f5c2f9f7eec8436e6b7f2e3c)
![A number line labeled 4:15 to 5:15 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:00.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5c413d54e16620424128094f2943cb05411e86ef)
![A number line labeled 4:15 to 5:15 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 5:10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0f26eb6f0d0b94797db285ec52eeb72ed54e19d9)
